attributes.action: do everything in his power to prevent Michael Martin from receiving a peerage after he resigns as Speaker.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition asks the Prime Minister to recognise that it would be inappropriate for Michael Martin to be elevated to the House of Lords following his resignation as Speaker of the House of Commons.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
